name: VrEducate
description:
Hugo Lecrubier : 3D Artist

Nathan Boisseleau : Developer

William Plessis : Developer

Luc Wild : Sound Designer

City : Laval, France

VrEducate is meant to be played by a 13-17 years old.

The purpose is to make people learn things while having fun !

Also : This is a VR Game meant to be play on the Oculus Quest 2 plaform
